Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Toledo in 1985...
Injured on 7/11/1985 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/9/1986, off Bradley Guillermo (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/1986, off Renato Luna (BC)...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Columbus on 7/28/1987...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Northeastern on 8/22/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1990, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/19/1992 to a 5-year deal worth $10,966,800 per year...
